pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hyperbolic DEA Estimation // Implements Data Envelopment Analysis (DEA) with a hyperbolic orientation using a non-linear programming solver. It enables flexible estimations with weight restrictions, non-discretionary variables, and a generalized distance function. Additionally, it allows for the calculation of slacks and super-efficiency scores. The methods are detailed in ttl et al. (2023), doi:10.1016/j.dajour.2023.100343. Furthermore, the package provides a non-linear profitability estimation built upon the DEA framework.
